title: Where is the Slay Belle Suprise Icon
body:
I have completed the requirements for the Slay Belle Suprise Icon for the Poro King, but I still haven't gotten the icon.
I was wondering if maybe it was the exact same icon as last year, and if that's the case, I don't think that's very fair, maybe a new one would of been better.

replies.body: scroll down, it'll be after last years harrowing, and before the chinese new year stuff
Yeah I had a feeling it was the old one.
